Data::Perl::Collection::Hash(3) User Contributed Perl Documentation Data::Perl::Collection::Hash(3)

NAME

Data::Perl::Collection::Hash - Wrapping class for Perl's built in hash structure.

VERSION

version 0.002011

SYNOPSIS

  use Data::Perl qw/hash/;

  my $hash = hash(a => 1, b => 2);

  $array->push(5);

  $hash->values; # (1, 2)

  $hash->set('foo', 'bar'); # (a => 1, b => 2, foo => 'bar')

DESCRIPTION

This class is a simple consumer of the Data::Perl::Role::Collection::Hash role, which provides all functionality. You probably want to look there instead.

AUTHOR

Matthew Phillips <mattp@cpan.org>
